utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Uh how may I help you?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Hi, so yeah I just came to the hospital because I've just been feeling over the last um few days uh just I can't really take like a deep breath. And then I've also been coughing up uh this greenish yellowish material.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Oh OK, and when did this uh cough start? Sorry.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: So I think the cough started like 4 days ago and then the shortness of breath started uh just yesterday.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and it's been yellowish green, were you coughing up sputum prior to this and um or did you have a cough before this?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, not really.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um and have you noticed any blood?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, no blood.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, um and the shortness of breath, are you experiencing this at rest or um or with exertion?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, like at rest, even right now I'm like having trouble taking deep breaths.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK are you feeling any uh any chest pain?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um not pain, but there's definitely some straining and discomfort when I take a deep breath.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK is it, is the discomfort worse when you take a deep breath?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh yeah, it's just like I just have to strain a lot to like take that deep breath.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and uh have you noticed any wheezing?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No wheezing.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and have you had any shortness of breath or do you have any shortness of breath if you lie flat?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, no, not really. Not that I've noticed.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, or have you had any uh times where you've uh woken up um from sleep because you were short of breath and you had to sit up?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright. Um and have you had any uh fevers or chills?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: I have had a fever like today, I had a fever I measured it was like 38.5. Yesterday, I felt like I had chills and a fever as well.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, yeah, certainly sounds like a fever and have you had any night sweats?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Last night, I would say I had night sweats. My sheets were a bit drenched.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. And have you had a sore throat?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Changes to uh, loss of smell, loss of taste?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, have you had a runny nose or felt congested?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and how about any eye symptoms like redness or itchiness, pain?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, no, nothing like that.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Uhm and um have you had any uh instances of fainting or feeling dizzy?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Nope.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Any abdominal pain?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Any nausea or vomiting?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Any diarrhea?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, any rashes?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No rashes.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Um and then any muscle aches or body pains?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, not that I know of.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and how has your energy been? Have you had any fatigue or malaise the last several days?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, I would say so. I just feel like I don't know if it's to do with the short, of being short of breath, but yeah, I just feel like I've just been needing more rest.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, OK and have you had any headaches?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: No, alright, um so you've had this uh cough and you've been bringing up more sputum and shortness of breath and um and you've had a fever as well, um have you been experiencing any other symptoms?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no, I think those are pretty much all the symptoms.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um and in the past, have you been diagnosed with any medical conditions before?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: I do have, uh I take medications for high blood pressure. Um then I take medications for high cholesterol as well.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um and do you take any other medications?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um just uh vitamin D calcium multi vitamins.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, any allergies to medications?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Not that I know of.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Alright, any prior surgeries or hospitalizations?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh yeah, I've had a few. Uh so I had a C-section in my twenties. Um then I had just uh five years ago, I had a um my gallbladder removed.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um and uh could you tell me a little bit about your living situation? Like who you're living with and and whereabouts?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, so I'm living alone right now. Um, just in an apartment.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, have you been around anybody who's been sick?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm no I, not anyone that I know of. I do, I I did see my just randkids just last week, though.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, did they have a runny nose? Any symptoms like that?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Not that I noticed, no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um have you traveled anywhere recently?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, I've been at home.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: No, OK. Um and and do you smoke cigarettes?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, I probably smoked for a very short time for like probably five years of my life in my 20s.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, uh, do you smoke um marijuana?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and do you use any recreational drugs?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um and um any family history of heart or lung conditions?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh, I do have uh, my father passed away from a heart attack in his 50s. My brother has um high blood pressure, diabetes. Um and on my mom's side, she had like osteoarthritis.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and any cancer that is in the family?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um skin cancer, on my um father's side.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, um and have you had antibiotics recently or within the last six months for any reason?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, no antibiotics.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, so, so that was everything that I wanted to ask today on uh on history. Um was there anything that you also wanted to mention I I maybe forgot?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, I think that's all.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Um OK, so uh yeah, with the the symptoms um it could be um pneumonia which could be bacterial or viral, um as well as the possibility of um something like uh like Covid, which is of course a concern for today. So we will go ahead and start those investigations and get a swab. Um and um you may need antibiotics for um for this, if there there is uh pneumonia so we'll also get a chest X-ray as well.

utterances.speaker: control
utterances.text: Add differential diagnosis
